mapper.select: SELECT ord.order_no, ord.goods_name, ord.goods_price, ord.buyer_name, ord.buyer_phone, ord.buyer_email, ord.target_pg, ord.create_dt, ord.update_dt, pay.id as "pay.id", pay.res_msg as "pay.res_msg", pay.res_cd as "pay.res_cd", pay.pg_txid as "pay.pg_txid", pay.amount as "pay.amount", pay.trace_no as "pay.trace_no", pay.tno as "pay.tno", pay.pay_method as "pay.pay_method", pay.pay_state as "pay.pay_state", pay.create_dt as "pay.create_dt", pay.update_dt as "pay.update_dt" FROM ord LEFT JOIN pay ON ord.order_no = pay.order_no
